actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 223 of title 18 of the United States Code to provide limitation of the Fourth Amendment exclusionary rule.

summary.text: Amends the Federal criminal code to provide that evidence obtained by a search or seizure shall not be excluded in a Federal proceeding if the seizure was undertaken in a reasonable good faith belief in its conformity with the fourth amendment to the Constitution. Provides that evidence obtained in accordance with a warrant is prima facie evidence of good faith, absent intentional and material misrepresentation.

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 223 of title 18 of the United States Code to provide limitation of the Fourth Amendment exclusionary rule.
